results.definition: thin layers of rock used for roofing
a list of candidates nominated by a political party to run for election to public offices
a fine-grained metamorphic rock that can be split into thin layers

examples: He slated his talk for 9 AM
She was slated to be his successor

results.definition: enter on a list or slate for an election
examples: He was slated for borough president

results.definition: (formerly) a writing tablet made of slate
